A.4.4 Mapping modules

A.4.4.4 Examples

// IDL
module physics {
  module quantum_mechanics {
    interface schroedinger {};
  };
};


//  Dylan
define open class physics/quantum-mechanics/<schroedinger> 
  (<object>)
end class;

Note: The next section covers the mapping of interfaces.
